abort.no_mosque: Sorry, no MAWAQIT mosques were found in your area. Please check your coordinates or remove the existing mosque configuration and set up a new one.
abort.already_configured: A single MAWAQIT entry is allowed. If you want to reconfigure your mosque, you can click on "Configure" next to the existing entry, or click on the 3 dots  and click on Delete.

error.wrong_credential: Wrong login or password, please retry.
